conversation.text:
Based on your request for sci-fi movies, I would recommend the movie "Inception". 

"Inception" is a 2010 science fiction film directed by Christopher Nolan and written by Nolan, Luc Besson, and Joe A. O'Sullivan.

The movie revolves around Dom Cobb, who is skilled in the art of extraction - breaking into people's dreams. 

One day, Cobb is offered a chance at redemption. He agrees to enter the mind of his deceased wife, Mal. However, this time, Mal wants Cobb to extract her husband's memories from her own mind.

As Cobb attempts to enter Mal's mind and retrieve the memories, he realizes that Mal has conspired with his subconscious to manipulate him into extracting the memories at any cost.

Cobb becomes increasingly paranoid and desperate as Mal continues to manipulate him. In the end, Cobb is able to extract the memories from Mal's mind. However, as he emerges from Mal's mind, Cobb realizes that he has paid a steep price for obtaining the memories.
